sentences.en: Ayi Jihu's show will feature all races, sexes and ages representing the multicultural face of London.
sentences.cn: 吉胡阿依的演出有不同的种族, 性别和年龄象征着伦敦这个城市.

sentences.en: CAVENDISH COLLEGE is proud of its multicultural student body which diversity of a cosmopolitan like London.
sentences.cn: 卡文迪什学院以拥有来自世界各地的留学生而自豪.

words.tran_cn: 多种民族的；涉及不同种族的
多种的；各式各样的；多方面的；多样性的

trans.tran_cn: 多种文化的，反映多种文化的，适合于多种文化的
trans.tran_en: involving or including people or ideas from many different countries, races, or religions
